contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The order of the Superior Court, 407 Pa.Super. 644, 584 A.2d 1046, is reversed in light of this Court’s decision in Commonwealth v. Zdrale, 530 Pa. 313, 608 A.2d 1037 (1992).
LARSEN, ZARPALA and CAPPY, JJ., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
